screenshot.caption: PTLV file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: In Pizza Tower, players climb a series of towers, battling cartoon enemies and collecting toppings along the way. The game is available for Windows, and it enjoys a healthy modding community.

Prior versions of Pizza Tower included an in-game level editor, which allowed players to create, share, and play levels saved as PTLV files. However, the current, Steam version of Pizza Tower does not include this level editor. At the time of this writing, the most popular current Pizza Tower level editor, Create Your Own Pizza (CYOP), does not support the PTLV format.
